Our apps use Google Analytics (third party scripts) that collect the following information and might (also) store such information as a cookie on the device you use to access our webpage: Google Analytics/Firebase Analytics: Demographics (browser language, country, city);

These entities may use cookies, web beacons and other tracing technologies to collect information about your use of our Services, including your IP address, MAC address, device identifiers, software and hardware information, browser information, time zone and usage information.
We may allow third parties to serve advertisements and provide analytics services in connection with our Services.
